name: Constellation
overview: Constellation is a space trade game. The player's task is manufacturing, trade in raw materials and speculation on interplanetary exchanges. There are four resources, three products, four planets and the player's base. The player can borrow money from the bank. Changes in the prices of raw materials and products are displayed in the messages at the top of the screen. There are also random events, such as the loss of raw materials as a result of a meteorite impact.
